scripts.test: echo Running test in browser. File: test/SpecRunner.html && open test/SpecRunner.html
scripts.minify_js: minify src/js/GitHubApiClient.js --out-file public/scripts/GitHubApiClient.min.js --mangle.keepClassName && minify src/js/main.js --out-file public/scripts/main.min.js --mangle.keepClassName
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
